data.actual_result: Users from the previous account are shown even though the account cannot see them
data.expected_result: The Quick Switcher should only show users that your account can see (via servers/DMs/friends)
data.short_description: [Overlay] Users from previous account show up in secondary account's Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two accounts (main & alt) - Login to the main (if not already) - Logout and then login to your alt - Open a game that supports the Overlay - Open the Overlay with your keybind - Press ctrl + k and then enter a @ symbol - Enter a letter and observe
